评论详情: These blouses are a very flattering style and if you can find the right size, color and patterns, you should really be happy with them. I have fairly long arms and the long sleeves are just right. I think the price was reasonable and I highly recommend this style. I usually wear a cotton T-shirt or tank top underneath. They can be dressed up with a skirt or dressy pants or more casual with jeans or shorts.

类型: Color: Long Flower Multiple OrangeSize: 3X-Large
评论详情: I bought several of these to wear with leggings. They are Women’s Plus Size Tunics. If they had it one size bigger I probably would have exchanged them for that because I like when things are a little bigger on me and don’t hug my body so much but this was doable so I let them be. I think I got 3 of them in different patterns for a good price. They do stretch and are comfortable and the colors are true and bright. They don’t shrink upon washing in cold water but I don’t know about drying because we drip dry our clothes and only use the dryer for towels and such. While I would say this is a bit clingy around the breast, waist and butt area it didn’t bother me in my neck or arms which is usually my problem areas.
perfect fit , I like baggy flowy tops and this is perfect
